sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 8.9 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 767,247 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 222,652 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 13,046. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
